org.interworldtransport.cladosG.Basis

Packages that use Basis
Package
Description
org.interworldtransport.cladosG
Provides the geometry classes and the structures needed for multi-algebra geometric models.

  • Uses of Basis in org.interworldtransport.cladosG

    protected Basis
    Algebra.gBasis
    The second among the common elements is the Eddington basis formed from all blades that can be produced through exterior products of generating 'coordinate' vectors.
